core.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicGame, ForwardModel

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Created with IntelliJ IDEA. User: Diego Date: 17/10/13 Time: 13:42 This is a Java port from Tom Schaul's VGDL - https://github.com/schaul/py-vgdl

    • Field Detail

      • spriteOrder

        protected int[] spriteOrder
        z-level of sprite types (in case of overlap)

      • singletons

        protected boolean[] singletons
        Singletons of the game.

      • classConst

        protected Content[] classConst
        Content objects for the different sprite types.. The index is the type of object Content encloses information about the class of the object and its parameters.

      • spriteGroups

        protected SpriteGroup[] spriteGroups
        Groups of sprites in the level. Each element of the array is a collection of sprites of a given type, which is also the index of the array.

      • collisionEffects

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Effect>[][] collisionEffects
        Relationships for collisions: double array of (list of) effects. Interaction between two sprites can trigger more than one effect. collisionEffects[] -> int id of the FIRST element taking part on the effects. collisionEffects[][] -> int id of the SECOND element taking part on the effects.

      • definedEffects

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Pair> definedEffects
        Pairs of all defined effects in the game.

      • eosEffects

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Effect>[] eosEffects
        List of EOS effects

      • definedEOSEffects

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> definedEOSEffects
        List of types that can trigger an EOS effect.

      • historicEvents

        protected java.util.TreeSet<Event> historicEvents
        Historic of events related to the avatar happened during the game. The entries are ordered asc. by game step.

      • iSubTypes

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[] iSubTypes
        For each entry, int identifier of sprite type, a list with all the itypes this sprite belongs to.

      • bucketList

        protected Game.Bucket[] bucketList
        Arraylist to hold collisions between objects in every frame

      • charMapping

        protected java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> charMapping
        Mapping between characters in the level and the entities they represent.

      • terminations

        protected java.util.ArrayList<Termination> terminations
        Termination set conditions to finish the game.

      • kill_list

        protected java.util.ArrayList<VGDLSprite> kill_list
        List of sprites killed in the game.

      • resources_limits

        protected int[] resources_limits
        Limit number of each resource type

      • resources_colors

        protected java.awt.Color[] resources_colors
        Color for each resource

        protected java.awt.Dimension screenSize
        Screen size.

      • size

        protected java.awt.Dimension size
        Dimensions of the game.

        Indicates if the game is stochastic.

        Number of sprites this game has.

        Game tick

        Key input

        Size of the block in pixels.

        Quick reference to the gamer

        protected boolean isEnded
        Indicates if the game is ended.

      • winner

        protected Types.WINNER winner
        Indicates if the game has been won by the player. See Types.WINNER for the values of this variable.

        protected int frame_rate
        Default frame rate of the basic game.

        protected ForwardModel fwdModel
        State observation for this game.

        Score of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • initSprites

        public void initSprites(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> spOrder,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> sings,
               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,SpriteContent> constructors)
        Initializes the sprite structures that hold the game.
        Parameters:
        spOrder - order of sprite types to be drawn on the screen.
        sings - sprites that are marked as singletons.
        constructors - map of sprite constructor's information.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Sets the game back to the state prior to load a level.

      • initForwardModel

        public void initForwardModel()
        Starts the forward model for the game.

      • parseParameters

        protected void parseParameters(GameContent content)
        Reads the parameters of a game type.
        Parameters:
        content - list of parameter-value pairs.

      • addSprite

        protected void addSprite(VGDLSprite sprite,
             int itype)
        Adds a new sprite to the pool of sprites of the game. Increments the sprite counter and also modifies is_stochastic and the avatar accordingly.
        Parameters:
        sprite - the new sprite to add.
        itype - main int type of this sprite (leaf of the hierarchy of types).

      • getNumSprites

        public int getNumSprites(int itype)
        Returns the number of sprites of the type given by parameter, and all its subtypes
        Parameters:
        itype - parent itype requested.
        Returns:
        the number of sprites of the type and subtypes.

      • runGame

        public double runGame(AbstractPlayer player,
             int randomSeed)
        Runs a game, without graphics.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that plays this game.
        randomSeed - sampleRandom seed for the whole game.
        Returns:
        the score of the game played.

      • playGame

        public double playGame(AbstractPlayer player,
              int randomSeed)
        Plays the game, graphics enabled.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that plays this game.
        randomSeed - sampleRandom seed for the whole game.
        Returns:
        the score of the game played.

      • disqualify

        public void disqualify()
        Disqualifies the player in the game, and also sets the isEnded flag to true.

      • tick

        protected void tick()
        Performs one tick for the game: calling update(this) in all sprites. It follows the opposite order of the drawing order (spriteOrder[]).

      • eventHandling

        protected void eventHandling()
        Handles collisions and triggers events.

      • terminationHandling

        protected void terminationHandling()
        Handles termination conditions, for every termination defined in 'terminations' array.

      • clearAll

        protected void clearAll()
        Deletes all the sprites killed in the previous step. Also, clears the array of collisions from the last step.

      • addSprite

        public VGDLSprite addSprite(int itype,
                   Vector2d position)
        Adds a sprite given a content and position.
        Parameters:
        itype - integer that identifies the definition of the sprite to add
        position - where the sprite has to be placed.

      • addSprite

        public VGDLSprite addSprite(SpriteContent content,
                   Vector2d position,
                   int itype)
        Adds a sprite given a content and position. It checks for possible singletons.
        Parameters:
        content - definition of the sprite to add
        position - where the sprite has to be placed.
        itype - integer identifier of this type of sprite.

      • getCharMapping

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getCharMapping()
        Returns the char mapping of this array, that relates characters in the level with sprite names that it references.
        Returns:
        the char mapping of this array. For each character, there is a list of N sprite names.
